title: v1.6.3.10-v4 Documentation Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.10-v3 to v1.6.3.10-v4 with the following key features:

Key v4 Features:
1. Container Isolation - `originContainerId` field for Firefox Containers
2. Cross-Tab Validation - `_isOwnedByCurrentTab()`, `_validateCrossTabOwnership()` in handlers
3. Scripting API Fallback - `executeWithScriptingFallback()` for timeout recovery
4. Transaction Cleanup - 30s timeout for stale transactions, 10s cleanup interval
5. Background Restart Detection - `BACKGROUND_HANDSHAKE` message
6. Enhanced Logging - Hydration filtering, tab ID retrieval, storage changes
7. Mutex Tab Context - `${operation}-${currentTabId}-${id}` lock format

Key Timing Constants (NEW in v4):
- KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL_MS: 20000 (was 25000 in v3)
- TRANSACTION_TIMEOUT_MS: 30000 (NEW)
- TRANSACTION_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS: 10000 (NEW)
- SCRIPTING_FALLBACK_TIMEOUT_MS: 2000 (NEW)

Files Updated:
- manifest.json: version 1.6.3.10-v4
- .github/copilot-instructions.md: Full v4 feature documentation
- README.md: v4 features section
- .github/agents/bug-fixer.md, bug-architect.md, feature-builder.md: Version context
- .github/agents/quicktabs-unified-agent.md, quicktabs-cross-tab-agent.md: v4 features
- .github/agents/copilot-docs-updater.md: Updated to v4
